languages.text: "Что, Лекс меня приговори, я только что услышал?" {n}Соломон чуть повышает голос, что на языке невозмутимого арбитра означает крайнюю степень возмущения.{/n} "Обычно я не затрудняюсь вынести суждение, но сейчас даже не знаю, с чего начать".

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."
languages.original_text: "Что, Лекс меня приговори, я только что услышал?" {n}Соломон чуть повышает голос, что на языке невозмутимого арбитра означает крайнюю степень возмущения.{/n} "Обычно я не затрудняюсь вынести суждение, но сейчас даже не знаю, с чего начать".

traits.locale_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

{n}Solomorne's eyebrows rise slightly, which means the impassive Arbitrator is surprised to a disturbing degree.{/n} "I usually have no trouble passing judgement, but Lex be my witness, in this case I do not even know where to start."

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

"What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

languages.text: “帝国法典在上，我刚刚是听到了什么啊？”{n}索罗蒙微微扬起了声音，这表明，这位作风冷硬的监察官此刻已经怒不可遏。{/n}“通常情况下，我可以毫不费力地传达判决，但这场判决却让我不知所措。”
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: “帝国法典在上，我刚刚是听到了什么啊？”{n}索罗蒙微微扬起了声音，这表明，这位作风冷硬的监察官此刻已经怒不可遏。{/n}“通常情况下，我可以毫不费力地传达判决，但这场判决却让我不知所措。”

languages.text: «Por la Lex, ¿qué acabo de escuchar?». {n}Solomorne levanta ligeramente la voz, indicando que el habitualmente impertérrito Arbitrator está indignado.{/n} «Normalmente no tengo reparos en juzgar a nadie, pero en este caso ni siquiera sé por dónde empezar».
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: «Por la Lex, ¿qué acabo de escuchar?». {n}Solomorne levanta ligeramente la voz, indicando que el habitualmente impertérrito Arbitrator está indignado.{/n} «Normalmente no tengo reparos en juzgar a nadie, pero en este caso ni siquiera sé por dónde empezar».

languages.text: "Lex adına neler duyuyorum?" {n}Solomorne'un sesinin yükselmesi, genellikle kayıtsız olan Yargıcı'nın oldukça kızdığını gösteriyor.{/n} "Normalde hüküm vermekte zorlanmam ama bu durumda nereden başlayacağımı bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: "Lex adına neler duyuyorum?" {n}Solomorne'un sesinin yükselmesi, genellikle kayıtsız olan Yargıcı'nın oldukça kızdığını gösteriyor.{/n} "Normalde hüküm vermekte zorlanmam ama bu durumda nereden başlayacağımı bilmiyorum."

languages.text: 「どういう意味だ？」{n} ソローモンは少し声を大きくする。常に冷静なアービトレイターが動揺するほど驚いていることを示している。{/n}「俺はいつも問題なく判決を下すが、この場合、どこから始めるべきかさえわからない」
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの眉がわずかに上がり、常に冷静なアービトレイターが動揺するほど驚いていることを示している。{/n}「俺はいつも問題なく判決を下すが、レックスがその証人であり、この場合、どこから始めるべきかさえわからない」

languages.text: « Au nom de la Lex, qu'est-ce que je viens d'entendre ? » {n}Solomorne hausse imperceptiblement la voix, ce qui trahit chez l'Arbitrator d'ordinaire imperturbable une profonde indignation.{/n} « En temps normal, je n'ai aucun scrupule à porter un jugement, mais en l'occurrence, je ne sais même pas par où commencer. »
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de la Lex, qu'est-ce que je viens d'entendre ? » {n}Solomorne hausse imperceptiblement la voix, ce qui trahit chez l'Arbitrator d'ordinaire imperturbable une profonde indignation.{/n} « En temps normal, je n'ai aucun scrupule à porter un jugement, mais en l'occurrence, je ne sais même pas par où commencer. »

languages.text: "Was im Namen des Lex habe ich da gerade gehört?" {n}Solomorne erhebt seine Stimme ein wenig – der üblicherweise so teilnahmslose Arbitrator ist offenbar in verstörendem Maße überrascht.{/n} "Für gewöhnlich fällt es mir nicht schwer, zu urteilen, doch in diesem Fall weiß ich nicht einmal, wo ich anfangen soll."
languages.original_text: "What in the Lex's name did I just hear?" {n}Solomorne raises his voice slightly, indicating that the usually impassive Arbitrator is profoundly indignant.{/n} "I normally have no trouble passing judgement, but in this case, I don't even know where to start."

traits.locale_text: "Was im Namen des Lex habe ich da gerade gehört?" {n}Solomorne erhebt seine Stimme ein wenig – der üblicherweise so teilnahmslose Arbitrator ist offenbar in verstörendem Maße überrascht.{/n} "Für gewöhnlich fällt es mir nicht schwer, zu urteilen, doch in diesem Fall weiß ich nicht einmal, wo ich anfangen soll."
